body.name: Original Broombi - All-Surface Silicone Broom, Squeegee, Pet Hair Remover - Smart Broom for Indoor Cleaning - Cleans Glass, Fine Dust, Hair, Liquids - for Smooth Floors, Rugs, Windows (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 37 mins
features: PATENTED QUAD-BLADE TECHNOLOGY: Unique design silicone edge creates static-electricity when used to attract hair and fine dust. Efficiently cleans every nook and cranny of the house.

EXTREMELY VERSATILE: Sweeps up every shard of broken glass, liquid spills, fine dust, coffee granules, sugar, removes pet and human hairs, and easily wipes up gooey messes such as ketchup, broken eggs.

CLEANS ON MANY SURFACES: Smooth floors, tile, hardwood, windows, most types of carpets and rugs (low pile). Broombi cleans on wide areas as well as tight corners and hard to reach places such as under beds and sofas.

WASHABLE, EASY TO MAINTAIN, VERY HYGIENIC: Unlike ordinary brooms, Broombi will never have dirty and unsanitary bristles. Simply rinse the smooth blades after each use to keep Broombi and your house clean and hygienic.
HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS: Broombi is very lightweight yet extremely durable, made of a solid construction that will last for years.
ONE-PIECE TELESCOPIC POLE: A sturdy one-piece adjustable length telescopic pole with anti-corrosion coating. The pole length can be adjusted from 36" - 55" for any cleaning job. No assembly required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All-Surface Indoor Cleaning The Original Broombi For Fine Dust & Debris, Liquids, Gooey Messes, Removes Pet & Human Hair, Broken Glass, And More!

Advanced Technology in a Broom QUAD-BLADE TECHNOLOGY Broombi's powerful quadruple blades pick up all types of contaminants and debris along its path, cleaning on smooth surfaces, rugs, and fabrics. STATIC ELECTRICITY POWER The blades create static electricity when in use, attracting and trapping fine dust and hairs. Cleaning is done efficiently and with less effort. AIR-FLOW GRID FRAME Broombi's unique grid frame design allows air to pass through while sweeping and prevents dust from disbursing as it glides along surfaces. LIGHTWEIGHT & EASY TO USE Broombi was designed to be lightweight, efficient, and easy to use. Easy cleaning with no strain on your arms, perfect for daily use.

You've tried the rest, now try Broombi! Discover a new way to clean Broombi is a unique and versatile product that is useful for any household. It can clean on smooth surfaces as well as fabrics, carpet and rugs. It cleans all types of debris, fine dust, liquids, broken glass, removes hair, and pet hair. The proprietary materials used for the blades create static electricity when cleaning, attracting dust like a magnet, preventing it from escaping when sweeping. Broombi can be washed and is easy to maintain. Very hygienic and no wasted refills!

One broom to rule them all! Dust & Debris Works on smooth floors - tiles, hardwood, marble, and more. Pet & Human Hair Great on rugs for removing dog, cat, and human hair. Broken Glass Clean glass safely - no bristles so shards do not get caught. Gooey Messes Clean liquids and gooey messes such as ketchup and broken eggs.

Windows & Glass So many uses. Very Sturdy and Durable Broombi is made from high-quality materials. A virtually unbreakable frame and sturdy pole. Easy to Maintain Just rinse to clean, very hygienic - no more dirty bristles! Telescopic Pole 36" - 55" One-piece, adjustable-length pole with anti-corrosion coating.

Why is it so lightweight? Broombi was designed to be used indoors and we made it lightweight and easy to use for everyone, yet sturdy enough to tackle most cleaning jobs without putting stress on your arms or back. In fact, Broombi is more efficient with gentle strokes. What's the best way to use Broombi? Broombi is an efficient indoor broom and works best with light, gentle strokes. There is no need to use excessive force when sweeping. Use longer strokes on smooth floors and shorter strokes on carpet and rugs. Are there any precautions? Do not store Broombi upright on the broom head as this may cause the blade to curl and may damage the blade. Instead, lay it flat or hang it on a hook. Also, for best results, rinse it clean after each use. Finally, do not use Broombi outdoors. Do you sell replacement broom heads? Yes, we sell replacement broom heads. However, our broom heads are made specifically for use with the Broombi pole and will not work with other types of poles, so you need to purchase the Broombi first. Can this replace my conventional broom? Yes, in fact, unlike conventional brooms, Broombi has no bristles and can easily be rinsed clean after each use. No more pulling hair and dirt out of dirty bristles makes life easier and means a cleaner and more hygienic household.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the Original Broombi to my cleaning arsenal, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance. This innovative cleaning tool has proven to be a game-changer, simplifying my indoor cleaning routines and exceeding my expectations in multiple ways.First and foremost, the versatility of the Original Broombi is outstanding. It's not just a broom; it's an all-in-one cleaning solution. The silicone bristles are incredibly efficient at sweeping up dust, dirt, and pet hair from various surfaces, including hardwood floors, tiles, carpets, and even linoleum. The fact that it excels on both dry and wet surfaces is a huge plus.The squeegee feature is an added bonus. It allows me to seamlessly transition from sweeping to cleaning up spills and messes, making my daily chores more efficient and less time-consuming. The rubber blade of the squeegee does an excellent job of clearing away liquid, leaving surfaces dry and spotless.Speaking of pet hair, the Original Broombi has become a lifesaver for pet owners like me. It's remarkably effective at picking up stubborn pet hair from floors and furniture, which is a constant struggle in a pet-friendly household. It saves me valuable time and effort in keeping my home clean and fur-free.The build quality of the Original Broombi is exceptional. It feels sturdy and well-constructed, with no signs of wear or tear even after regular use. The ergonomic handle is comfortable to hold and allows for effortless maneuverability, making it easy to reach tight spaces and corners.Maintenance is a breeze. Cleaning the broom after use is as simple as running it under water, and it's good as new. The silicone bristles do not trap dirt or odors, ensuring that it remains hygienic and odor-free.In summary, the Original Broombi is a remarkable cleaning tool that has truly simplified my indoor cleaning routines. Its versatility, efficiency, and durability are second to none. Whether you're dealing with pet hair, spills, or general cleaning, this smart broom has got you covered. It has become an indispensable part of my cleaning regimen, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to make their indoor cleaning tasks more efficient and hassle-free. It's a fantastic investment that delivers exceptional results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and effective
reviews.reviewText: Great broom. It captures debris as well as or better than a bristle broom and it’s easier to clean. I love the design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but I'll keep my old broom
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this broom - I have 3 labradors, I sweep my whole house (laminate floors) twice a week. I currently use a nylon angle broom. The Broombi is ok, but I will be keeping my old broom.The good:Yes, it sweeps. And yes it picks up the dog hair into neat lines on the floor that don't fly all over the place due to (1) the static electricity it claims to have, plus (2) the open grid design. It's also lightweight - not necessary, but a plus. Finally, it's easy to clean - just rinse it with water.The bad:I have a tight area (6" wide) between a wall and a cabinet that is too narrow for this broom. My old broom gets at it fine, however! Also, you have to hang this on a hook or other organizer that keeps the broom off the floor. I already have this, but not everyone does. I already nicked the head on something while sweeping the floor. I'm not sure how or when that happened, but it's damaged after the first use. We often get fine dirt/granite particles tracked into the house. Finally, this is not at all for outdoor use. My current broom can do both.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little elbow grease needed, but works very well!
reviews.reviewText: I have a heavy glass coffee table in my living room that has a low shelf (with more heavy things on it). It’s really annoying for me to move while cleaning, which means dog fluff, dirt, crumbs, and toys get stuck under there to until the next time I can get a second pair of hands to move it. And who wants to look at all that through their coffee table? 🙈Somehow I found this broom & it is EXACTLY what I needed. Very skinny/low profile, so it fits under the table/shelf & drags the dust and fluff and crumbs right out!You do need to keep moving the broom to keep everything from being left behind (hence the elbow grease), but it’s easy enough & so worth it! 10 out of 10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok, not great!
reviews.reviewText: The broom is ok, it’s very light and tends to waft dog hair up and around rather than keeping it on the floor. Would not recommend for people with pets and a lot of hair. That said, I am keeping it because it is very thin and I can get it under my kitchen appliances to pull hair out from under them, which my regular rubber broom is too thick for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Daily helper
reviews.reviewText: I really had no expectations when I got this. It is so easy to do the floors, and the magic of it, it grabs everything! I have a dog and his hair is everywhere. It even grabs on carpet. I was even thinking of putting a micro fiber towel and trying it on my mirror. For the price, I'm looking at getting one for outside.Try it, it won’t disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Picks up dog hair great!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I will never go back to using a regular broom again. This gets into the corners and picks up dog hair (2 Goldens) easily, crumbs, dirt, rocks and shredded dog toys - all easy to sweep up. Will be purchasing another one for RV and summer home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I first put it together, I thought it was the flimsiest thing and that it was going to be useless. That it would break the first time I used it. If you can get around the fact that it unscrews while you’re using it and you have to hold it together, it does do a great job under the couch, and it does a phenomenal job on rugs, if you have pets who shed. And that will save you lots of vacuum cleaner bags. The concept is great! Needs to be a little bit more durable - they need to put more weight into it and improve the quality.
Muy útil, resistente y esta genial para cuando se te cae mucho el pelo o cuando tienes perritos en casa

The media could not be loaded. In product description they specified as original but while examining the product I realised that I received a fake product. It's nothing more than a simple floor wiper that I received.

While delivery was faster than anticipated, the item came in pieces. The pole comes loose even when connected with force. This 'all-surface broom' will barely be useful on tiles let alone carpet, it feels like it is going to break when using only lightly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not the height of a regular broom
reviews.reviewText: It works but the joints come apart and it’s way too short. It hurt my back.
Esta “escoba mágica” esta hecha de buen material. Es multifuncional y muy práctica
